tasks.label: Auto Test on Save
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch --quiet && cargo watch -x "test" -w lossless-transform-utils/src

tasks.label: Auto Coverage on Save
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch --quiet && cargo install cargo-tarpaulin --quiet && cargo watch -x "tarpaulin --skip-clean --out Xml --out Html --engine llvm --target-dir target/coverage-build" -w lossless-transform-utils/src

tasks.label: Generate Code Coverage
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-tarpaulin --quiet && cargo tarpaulin --skip-clean --out Xml --out Html --engine llvm --target-dir target/coverage-build

tasks.label: Run Tests to Detect Undefined Behaviour
tasks.command: rustup +nightly component add miri --quiet && cargo +nightly miri test

tasks.label: Run Tests to Detect Undefined Behaviour (Big Endian)
tasks.command: rustup +nightly component add miri --quiet && cargo +nightly miri test --target powerpc64-unknown-linux-gnu

tasks.label: Test Cross-Compile: Linux (PowerPC 64-bit) [Big Endian]
tasks.command: cargo install cross --git https://github.com/cross-rs/cross --quiet && cross test --target powerpc64-unknown-linux-gnu
